Combat

Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Tavern Brawler: Weapon Proficiency (Improvised)/Unarmed attacks inflict 1d4 HP
Bond Of Mutual Suffering: Can use a reaction in response to suffering damage to inflict equal damage on the attacker 2 times per short rest
Fortune's Grace: Can reroll an attack, ability, or saving throw, or force a reroll on an attacker, once per long rest
Grappler: Has advantage on attacks on a grappled foe and can restrain a grappled foe with an additional successful grapple
Relentless Endurance: Can retain 1 hit point when brought to 0 hit points once per long rest
Savage Attacks: Melee critical hits inflict 1 additional die of damage
Tavern Brawler: Can use a bonus action to grapple after a successful unarmed or improvised attack
Thicker Than Water: Regains +6 hit points from healing spells and has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage during spell concentration
Save Proficiency: Intelligence; Wisdom

Magic
Spell Slots: K0: 2; K1: 1; W0: 5; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 3; W5: 3; W6: 2; W7: 2; W8: 1; W9: 1 Attack: K: 5; W: 6 Spell DC: K: 13; W: 14
Spells:
Acid Splash (W0 Conj): R60' Inflicts 4d6 HP acid (save Dexterity negates) on a single target or 2 adjacent targets
Arcane Lock (W2 Abju): Touched barrier opens only for designated creatures or a specified password; Knock suppresses the effects for 10 min
Chain Lightning (W6 Evoc): R150' Inflicts 10d8 HP lightning (save Dexterity half) on 4 targets in a 30' radius [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Clairvoyance (W3 Divi): R1 mile Self can see or hear through an invisible sensor for concentration up to 10 min
Disintegrate (W6 Tran): R60' Inflicts 10d6+40 HP force and turns the target to dust if reduced to 0 HP (save Dexterity negates), or disintegrates a Large or smaller object or magical force [+Level inflicts +3d6 HP]
Fly (W3 Tran): Touched gains a 60' fly speed for concentration up to 10 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Forcecage (W7 Evoc): R100' Creates a choice of a 20' barred force cube or a 10' solid force box for 1 hr
Greater Invisibility (W4 Illu): Touched becomes invisible for concentration up to 1 min
Hellish Rebuke (K1 Evoc): R60' Cast as a reaction, inflicts 2d10 HP fire on a successful attacker (save Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Identify (W1 Divi): Reveals the magic properties or spells affecting touched [R]
Legend Lore (W5 Divi): Reveals info about a specified person, place, or object
Mage Armor (W1 Abju): Willing, unarmored touched gains AC 13 + Dexterity modifier for 8 hr; the spell ends if the target dons armor
Mage Hand (K0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Magic Mouth (W2 Illu): R30' Target object speaks a 25-word message when triggered [R]
Maze (W8 Conj): R60' Sends the target to a labyrinthine demiplane (save DC 20 Intelligence escapes; minotaurs and goristro demons automatically succeed) for concentration up to 10 min
Melf's Acid Arrow (W2 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 4d4 HP acid, plus 2d4 HP the following rd (miss half initial HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d4 HP initial and secondary]
Minor Illusion (W0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum (W4 Abju): R120' Protects up to 100' sq from choices of sound, vision, divination, teleportation, and planar travel for 1 day; casting daily for 1 year makes the effects permanent [+Level increases the protected area by 100']
Mordenkainen's Sword (W7 Evoc): R60' Creates a force weapon that inflicts 3d10 HP force and can move 20' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Planar Binding (W5 Abju): R60' Binds a celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend to service (save Charisma negates) for 1 day [+Level extends the duration to 10, 30, 180, or 366 days at level 6, 7, 8, or 9]
Prestidigitation (W0 Tran): R10' Creates minor magic effects for 1 hr
Protection From Evil And Good (W1 Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead and advantage on saves vs. existing conditions for concentration up to 10 min; those creatures also suffer disadvantage on attacks on the target
Stinking Cloud (W3 Conj): R90' 20' radius inflicts loss of actions (save Constitution negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Stone Shape (W4 Tran): Reshapes touched 5' cube of stone
Teleportation Circle (W5 Conj): R10' Creates a portal that provides a link to similar circles for 1 rd
Tenser's Floating Disk (W1 Conj): R30' 3'x1" force disk floats 3' above the ground 20' behind self and holds 500 lbs for 1 hr [R]
True Polymorph (W9 Tran): R30' Transforms the target creature (save Wisdom negates) or object for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP; concentrating for a full hr makes the change permanent
True Strike (K0 Divi): R30' Self gains advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd
True Strike (W0 Divi): R30' Self gains advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Warlock): Knows 2 warlock cantrips and can cast a chosen K1 spell once per long rest
Arcane Recovery: Can recover 10 spell slot levels (level 5 maximum) at the end of a short rest once per long rest
Blood Channeling: Can use own damaged body as an arcane focus, and can suffer 1d10 HP necrotic per 50 GP to forego material components when casting
Flash Recall: Can replace a prepared spell once per short rest
Glyph Of Hemorrhaging: Can curse a successful spell attack target to suffer +1d6 HP necrotic from each attack for 1 min (save Constitution ends) once per short rest
Sanguine Burst: Can suffer HP necrotic equal to a spell's level to reroll 1 damage die
Signature Spells: Can cast 2 chosen W3 spells without spending a spell slot once per short rest
Spell Mastery: Can cast a chosen W1 spell and a chosen W2 spell at will and change the choices after 8 hr of study
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the wizard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
